Name: THE GAME
About the game: Info You are in a game and a mysterious man appears and says that to finish it you need a free ticket and to get it you have to choose a path: the left or right path. On the left you will help Juli and on right will help Lorena. Who will you choose? Juli and Lorena are waiting. In this game you can choose between a male and a female appearence and you have to choose one of two paths, one leads to the puzzle and the other leads to JRPG battles. 'The Game' is a game that talks about emotional intelligence in different ways, available for all ages. Characters Him The person who 'helps' you in the beginning, telling you what to do. He seems to know about a lot of things, but he doesn't talk about it. Yuna A serious, listless maid who doesn't show much emotion. She serves 'him' and is in the game to support you at times. Juli A girl who is half human, half dog. She is adorable, energetic, loves humans and likes food, fruits and sweets. Lorena A psychologist who appears to be very mature, has brown eyes and light brown hair. Friendly, assertive and open, but a little distant. The Game contains: • Short duration (15-40 minutes) • Nostalgic themes • Multiple Choices • Four Endings that will depend on your actions • 1 secret room and 2 easter eggs.
